name: Really Easy Banner
author: UnikForce IT

sections.description:
Enahance your wp header to the next level by adding any kind of banner that is easy to use and customizable.

COMPLETELY CUSTOMIZABLE

Each layout comes with bunch of options to control every possible things. You can achieve nearly any design with your imagination.

LIGHT WEIGHT & INSTANT LOADING

No extra resources or messy codes to slow down your website. Optimized for super fast loading and instant Live editing.

ELEMENTS CONTROL OPTION

Enable and disable individual elements to make your page loading faster and smoother. You can deactivate unnecessary widgets to keep the site lite.

EXPERT SUPPORT

We have extra-ordinary support team ready to help you. Ask your questions in the support forum, or contact us directly through live chat and contact form.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. You can type “UnikForce Elementor WooCommerce Builder Elementor For WooCommerce Builder” on your element tabs within Elementor editor and all the avialable elements will appear.
sections.faq:
Can I get more customize options of the banner?

Yes, Let us know what you really need options we would add it for you.
